edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.http

Class UniversalHttpClientExtended

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.http.UniversalHttpClient
      • edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.http.UniversalHttpClientExtended
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.umass.cs.gnsclient.client.GNSClientInterface

    public class UniversalHttpClientExtended
extends UniversalHttpClient
    This class defines an extension to AbstractGnrsClient to communicate with a GNS instance over HTTP. This extension contains more methods.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Emmanuel Cecchet

      • fieldReadFirstElement

        public String fieldReadFirstElement(String guid,
                                    String field,
                                    GuidEntry reader)
                             throws Exception
        Reads the first value for a key from the GNS server for the given guid. The guid of the user attempting access is also needed. Signs the query using the private key of the user associated with the reader guid (unsigned if reader is null).
        Parameters:
        guid -
        field -
        reader -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        Exception

      • clearTagged

        public void clearTagged(String tag)
                 throws Exception
        Removes all guids that have the corresponding tag. Removes the reverse fields for the entity name and aliases. Note: doesn't remove all the associated fields yet, though, so still a work in progress.
        Parameters:
        tag -
        Throws:
        Exception
